name: Springtime (Corrupt Spaghetti)
description:
Plant flowers as a little robot!

made for the Ludus Ex Machina game jam

controls:
- wasd or arrow keys to move
- m to mute
- hold jump to jump higher

credits:
- graphics generated using VQGAN+CLIP (sflckr library)
- game idea prompt generated by InferKit
- music and everything else by Corrupt Spaghetti

ai generated prompt"
"My game idea for the Ludus Ex Machina game jam is called Springtime, and it's about taking time to smell the roses, and reflecting on our place in nature. I've been playing with playing with these themes and notions for a couple of years now, and some of my earliest game ideas came from playing in nature. I'd think, "Why are you wasting this beautiful world on buildings and roads?" Or, "Why don't you just spend more time taking a walk in nature?""
